Description:
The Cross-Stitch House, an Architectural Oasis
Introducing the Cross-Stitch House. This beautifully renovated Victorian terrace home has been masterfully updated and expanded by Fiona Dunin of FMD Architects and features the high ceilings and decorative features of the original, together with a spectacular rear extension and courtyard garden. Step inside and discover a master bedroom with ample built-in robes, semi-ensuited to perhaps the most beautiful bathroom in Melbourne - boasting gorgeous light from the ferny pocket garden and the most delightful view from the shower. The second bedroom with built-in robes features lovely landscaped garden views to the front.
Walk through and find soaring vaulted ceilings with exposed engineered timber beams and an ultramodern designer kitchen with Miele appliances and integrated fridge. Moving seamlessly through this chic space come to a stunning atrium courtyard complete with pond and paved areas, with architectural elements framing this tranquil oasis for design perfection.
Designed to maximise natural light and with every room having a garden view, this is the perfect stylish downsizer or professional retreat. Just 5 minutes' walk to Clifton Hill station, shops and cafes, and only 20 minutes to the CBD. An ultramodern touch to a classic Victorian, and an opportunity not to be missed. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd.
Insights: 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Classic Victorian, position + potential
This semi-detached terrace (Land Approx 165sqm) with exceptional scope to improve and extend (STCA) offers comfortable light-filled living close to Clifton Hill Village and Station, the Darling Gardens and freeway access. A flexible floor plan comprises a Baltic-lined living room, large functional kitchen/meals, main bedroom (BIRs), second bedroom/dining area, and bathroom with retro fittings. Including a northerly paved courtyard and laundry, this well-positioned home features gas heating and period detail.
Insights: 104 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
LUXURIOUS SPACE AND MODERN STYLE
Wonderfully positioned with beautiful Merri Creek Trail and Yarra Bend Park at the end of the street, great cafes down the road, and within 10 minutes walk of the train & buses; discover a world of quiet, spacious comfort in this huge tri-level masterpiece. It combines the feel of a mansion with the low-maintenance elegance of an inner-city townhouse. On the ground floor, find two large bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes, a family bathroom, laundry, double remote garage and heaps of storage space. Step up the hardwood stairs to an enormous living and dining zone with large north-facing balcony, served by a big open plan kitchen with over three meters of island counter space and high-end Miele appliances. The perfect venue for a party with your most discerning friends! On the top level: A relaxing oasis with study nook and two master suites, the main suite benefiting from its own private north-aspect balcony, views across the suburbs to the Yarra Valley, and walk-in robes; luxury ensuite with double sinks and separate bath & shower. With colour intercom security, ducted heating and cooling, timber floors, fabulous natural light, and easy access to the CBD, universities and everything the city has to offer, you'll be the envy of your friends in this perfect inner-city residence.
Insights: 179 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Secluded contemporary style, CBD views
In a secure and stylish garden development, just a short stroll to Dight's Falls, Yarra parkland, Clifton Hill Village and station, this elegant low-maintenance town residence with city views offers a carefully-zoned floor plan comprising a spacious light-filled living/dining room opening to a north-facing al fresco entertaining terrace, custom Miele-equipped kitchen, 2 upper-level bedrooms (BIRs, ensuite with walk-in shower to main), large 3rd bedroom/home office, sleek main bathroom, powder room and concealed laundry, plus internal entry garage and storage room. Features of this appealing CBD-edge retreat include polished timber floors, split-system air conditioning, alarm and quality appointments.
Insights: 3/82 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Impeccably renovated, a home of surprises!
Clifton Hill history is encapsulated in this former sweetshop residence, superbly transformed into a light-filled family home combining period elegance with clean-edged contemporary style.
This eclectic home offers a versatile floor plan comprising 4 generous bedrooms (one with shower room) a stylish family bathroom and powder room.
A designer kitchen with premium appliances, stone benches and pantry adjoins an expansive living dining room flowing through multi folds to a wonderful North facing productive garden and entertaining area.
Including a workstation, concealed laundry and large garage, this exceptional home close to Village cafes, station and schools features Baltic and polished concrete floors, generous storage, split-system air conditioning and 5000ltr water tank.
Insights: 65 Roseneath Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
A Flexible Family Focus In The Village
A peaceful and private indoor-outdoor sanctuary at the heart of the village, this freestanding double block-fronted Victorian's flexible space and welcoming feel offer the ideal fit for an inner-city family. Wide frontage and a classic facade reveal a single-storey home of immense lifestyle appeal with up to four bedrooms plus a study providing impressive accommodation complemented by hydronic heating, air-conditioning, Jarrah floorboards, ceiling fans and copious storage including attic. Stroll with ease to schools, cafe, shops, Merri Creek trails, Quarries Park and Clifton Hill station from this fabulous residence featuring living room, north-facing family/meals area, quality kitchen with Ilve and Smeg appliances, stylish bathroom, versatile studio/office or big bedroom, European laundry, sensational landscaped garden with pond and huge sun-drenched entertainment deck.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978
Insights: 46 Fenwick Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Room to Grow
This double fronted Victorian provides a rare and affordable opportunity to secure long term family accommodation in a magnificent location. Presented in comfortable order with 3 bedroom, 4th bed/study, bathroom, kitchen dining, lounge and big backyard with off street parking.
Close to parks, great schools and public transport this is an ideal next step for a growing family.

Description:
VICTORIAN ELEGANCE IN THE HEART OF THE VILLAGE
This classic double-fronted residence, renovated and extended for family living, combines period warmth with modern amenity in an exclusive enclave minutes from Clifton Hill station and cafes, and close to primary schools and Yarra parkland. Filled with light, it offers spacious rooms and a versatile floor plan comprising a handsome sitting room/4th BR and 3 double bedrooms opening from a wide Baltic-floored hall, living room, dining/informal living, solid timber kitchen with Miele appliances, large family bathroom (spa bath), laundry and 2nd WC. Including a deep paved and landscaped northerly garden with off street parking and workshop, this welcoming home features good storage, marble and timber-mantelled OFPs, hydronic heating and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 16 Spensley Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Love Retro or Renovate…
Whilst the décor is definitely retro and likely in need of modernisation there is no mistaking an outstanding location strolling distance to Clifton Hill Village & train station, a sizeable 70’s apartment of some 68sqm and the vast potential to create something special in accordance with your own taste and budget.
Ideal as a first property for the devoted inner city dweller or an astute investment the apartment features 2 double bedrooms with built in robes, spacious living/dining, functional kitchen with electric upright stove, bathroom with shower over bath, laundry facilities and separate toilet.
Comfortable but ‘tired’ the apartment offers enormous scope for further improvement right in the heart of the Clifton Hill village... Outstanding!
NOTE: INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY

Description:
Spacious park-edge living with CBD views
This light-filled contemporary residence in a secluded development bordering hectares of Yarra parkland and close to Dight's Falls and Clifton Hill Village offers splendid low-maintenance living. With generous outdoor spaces and upper-level CBD views, it comprises 3 double bedrooms (main with ensuite and WIR), large study/retreat flowing to entertaining terrace, an expansive living/dining room with balconies to 2 sides, designer kitchen/meals (quality fittings, pantry), sleek 2nd bathroom, powder room, laundry and storage room. Including an internal-entry garage, this beautifully situated home features polished timber floors, air conditioning and central heating.

Description:
Elegant conversion style: secluded & spacious
Formerly the Sidchrome Tools Factory, this spacious high-ceilinged residence offers tranquil and secure family living in a quiet precinct close to cafes, schools, Yarra parklands, station, bus and tram options and bike path. On its own title (no owners' corporation) with courtyard entry, the home offers a thoughtfully-zoned floor plan comprising four well separated double bedrooms plus study zone, an expansive living room, large informal living and dining room flowing to an enchanting central courtyard shaded by a mature tree, custom kitchen with quality appliances and stone benchtops, two stylish bathrooms, powder room and laundry. Including a generous rear entertaining deck, this exceptional low-maintenance home features 2kw solar power, generous storage, polished hardwood floors, evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
Insights: 1/1 Marshall Place, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2019 and 10 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Proportions & Peaceful Village Living
A quiet position in a vibrant village neighbourhood ensures this superbly renovated terrace offering sought-after peace and privacy is an outstanding inner-city oasis. Fitted with double-glazed windows throughout, the impressively proportioned layout presents space to enjoy in complete seclusion culminating in a light-filled living and dining zone with bifold doors revealing a beautifully landscaped bluestone paved entertainment courtyard. Secure a coveted Clifton Village lifestyle near Darling Gardens, recreation centre, Queens Parade cafes and train station with this picturesque period home featuring two large bedrooms, quality modern kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, stylish central bathroom, European laundry, Nobo panel heating, reverse-cycle air-conditioning, polished floorboards, gallery hanging system and rear ROW.
Nicholas Corby : 0418 512 978

Description:
Select Block of only 6…
Yes that’s right, this 2 bedroom apartment is part of a tightly held boutique block of only 6 located within the delightful environs of Clifton Hill literally a stroll to acres of picturesque Yarra River parkland that will prove an ideal purchase for the devoted inner city dweller or investor alike. However it’s not only the parks & bike tracks that you’ll enjoy as diverse range of eateries are close at hand as is the renowned fresh produce of Queens Parade and a myriad of transport options… A lifestyle rather than just an apartment awaits!
Infinitely comfortable and/or leasable as is but offering significant scope for improvement this ground floor apartment comprises sizeable lounge, kitchen/meals, bathroom with shower over bath, laundry facilities, separate toilet and 2 double bedrooms with built in robes. Features include gas cooking, gas space heater, single off street car space on title and a lovely garden outlook.

Description:
Perfectly Positioned
Taking advantage of its quiet street location, surrounded by beautiful period homes and its close proximity to many lovely leafy parks, excellent transport options, great shopping strip, cafes and local pubs, this renovated apartment, offers a coveted lifestyle for first time home owners or fantastic addition to the savvy investors portfolio.
On the first floor, a large communal patio area, prior to entering the apartment, is ideal for relaxing with a 'cuppa' or catching a few rays. Inside, the apartment has been totally modernized with a smart stainless steel kitchen, including European laundry, servicing the open meals and living area, complemented by floating timber floors.
The master bedroom, with wall of mirrored robes, is supported by the modern bathroom which includes a shower over the bath.
The rear laneway provides entry to your own car parking space.
An affordable opportunity to secure this little gem, with nothing to do except enjoy the lifestyle this wonderful suburb has to offer, so close to tram and train station on Hoddle Street and Fitzroy's wonderful array of restaurants
Insights: 7/29 Dwyer Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated retro on the park!
A solid seventies' block directly opposite the wide expanse of Darling Gardens finds this ground-floor apartment that sure makes a statement with its spacious design and deluxe features throughout. Light-filled interior boasts 2 double bedrooms (both with mirrored robes), sleek central bathroom and separate WC, spacious lounge complemented by a stunning stone-top kitchen complete with soft-close drawers, tiled splashbacks and stainless steel cooking appliances. Quality carpets and floors, internal laundry facilities and undercover parking space (via ROW) all add to the appeal, as well as close proximity to Hoddle Street buses and Clifton Hill Station, Queens Parade trams, cafes and shops, local schools and easy access to the Eastern Freeway. Exceptional inner-city living or investing!
Insights: 4/18 South Terrace, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate Edwardian
Offering well-preserved period detail, large rooms and a top location close to the Darling Gardens, Dight's Falls, Village cafes and transport, this appealing fully detached Edwardian residence will have strong interest for home owners and investors. With a classic floor plan comprising 2 double bedrooms (main with new BIRs), a well-proportioned living and dining room, updated kitchen/meals with stainless steel appliances and a neat bathroom/laundry, this well-positioned home, opening to a paved north-easterly courtyard, features polished Baltic floors, timber-mantelled open fire places and split-system air conditioning.
Insights: 16 Rutland Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2017 and 16 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
TOP FLOOR WITH STUNNING CITY VIEWS!
Contemporary style and within a boutique complex, makes a perfect young home buyers pad or an ideal investment opportunity. This fabulous apartment comprises two spacious bedrooms with BIR's, fully tiled bathroom, laundry facilities, quality kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench top, leading into the open plan living/dining zone with split system heating/cooling and timber flooring throughout before stepping out to comfortable size balcony, perfect to entertain on whilst enjoying the gorgeous city skyline views. Minutes from Yarra Park, Dight's Falls, Darling Gardens, Queens Parade shops and the Clifton Hill train station. Other features include remote garage access to the undercover parking, video intercom entrance, lift access and a big steel cage for additional storage. Currently leased with a return of $480 per week / $24,960 per annum approx. Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Something more...
Don't judge this one by its cover, there is an enormous amount of accommodation inside this charming, renovated single fronted terrace. There are 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms 1 study and a large open plan living area overlooking a courtyard garden and car access. Brilliantly located close to the Darling Gardens, great schools and the delights of Smith and Brunswick Sts close by.

Description:
Extensive living and style in the riverside quarter
A superb Studley Park outlook from an entertainers' balcony is the cream on the top of this sensational multi-level townhouse in a secure and secluded rear setting of a coveted residential complex. Clifton Hill's riverside quarter near Yarra trails and parkland provides an idyllic inner-city backdrop to this stylish home affording a fabulous lifestyle enhanced by multiple alfresco areas, excellent features and remote-control 2-car garage. This terrific property offering a healthy rental return for investors of $750-$800 per week is just moments to cafes, train station, shopping strips and schools, the large layout of this quiet contemporary townhouse includes 3 sizable robed bedrooms, 3 bathrooms (2 ensuites), smart living and dining, excellent Smeg-appointed kitchen with Calacatta marble benchtop, laundry, heating/cooling, alarm, video intercom and polished hardwood floors.
Insights: 19/184 Noone Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 25 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.
